trans-unit.source: Represents a column header in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en kolonneoverskrift i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder>.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren initialiserer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A>egenskapen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this cell.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en nøyaktig kopi av denne cellen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer det klonede <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessible object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter et nytt objekt som er tilgjengelig for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke eksplisitt kalle metoden CreateAccessibilityInstance, den kan kalles når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>egenskapen det refereres til.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ikke hente eller angi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>, må du legge til en referanse til det `Accessibility` samling installert med .NET Framework.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the formatted value of the cell to copy to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter formatert verdien i cellen til Kopier til den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClipboardCopyMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, this method is called by the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A> method to retrieve a clipboard-formatted value that represents the cell.
trans-unit.target: Avhengig av verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClipboardCopyMode%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>denne metoden kalles kontrollen, av kontrollens <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>metode for å hente en utklippstavlen-formatert verdi som representerer cellen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClipboardCopyMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The position-related parameters of this method indicate where this cell is located in the table of data representing the region defined by the selected cells in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Posisjonen-relaterte parameterne for denne metoden angir hvor denne cellen er plassert i tabell med data som representerer området som er definert av de merkede cellene i de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the cell's position, formatting information may be returned by this method in addition to the cell value.
trans-unit.target: Avhengig av den cellen posisjonen, kan informasjon om formatering returneres av denne metoden i tillegg til celleverdien.

trans-unit.source: For example, the HTML format for a cell in the first column of a row will include the tag that indicates the beginning of a row.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel inkluderer HTML-format for en celle i den første kolonnen i en rad koden som angir starten av en rad.

trans-unit.source: The supported clipboard formats include <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Støttede utklippstavlen formatene omfatter <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for raden som inneholder cellen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the cell is in the first column of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å angi at cellen er i den første kolonnen i området som er definert av de merkede cellene; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the cell is the last column of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å angi at cellen er den siste kolonnen i området som er definert av de merkede cellene; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the cell is in the first row of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å angi at cellen er i den første raden i området som er definert av de merkede cellene; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the cell is in the last row of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>for å angi at cellen er i den siste raden i området som er definert av de merkede cellene; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The current format string of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende Formatstrengen av cellen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object> that represents the value of the cell to copy to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer verdien i cellen kopiere til den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is not -1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndexer ikke -1.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's content area, which is calculated using the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object and cell style.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer det avgrensende rektangelet som omslutter den cellen området innhold, som beregnes ved hjelp av den angitte <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objekt og celle stil.

trans-unit.source: The size of the cell's contents is computed dynamically when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen på innholdet i celle beregnes dynamisk når denne metoden kalles.

trans-unit.source: This method is called internally when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentBounds%2A> property is read.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles internt når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentBounds%2A>egenskapen leses.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentBounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: The graphics context for the cell.
trans-unit.target: Grafikk konteksten for cellen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied to the cell.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> som skal brukes til cellen.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den cellen overordnet rad.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som bounds celleinnholdet.

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is not -1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndexer ikke -1.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the inherited shortcut menu for the specified row.
trans-unit.target: Henter arvede hurtigmenyen for den angitte raden.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to get the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> of.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden å hente den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref> av.

trans-unit.source: The index must be -1 to indicate the row of column headers.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen må være&1; for å angi rad med kolonneoverskrifter.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> of the column headers if one exists; otherwise, the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> inherited from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref> av kolonneoverskriftene Hvis det finnes en; ellers den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref> arvet fra <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is not -1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndexer ikke -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets the style applied to the cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter stilen som brukes til cellen.

trans-unit.source: This method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> that inherits its settings from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> objects returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>som arver innstillingene fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>objekter ble returnert av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>Egenskaper for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> og</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [cellestiler i den Windows Forms-kontroll for DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be populated with the inherited cell style.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> brukes med cellestilen arvede.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den cellen overordnet rad.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include inherited colors in the returned cell style; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>inkludere arvet fargene i cellestilen returnerte; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that includes the style settings of the cell inherited from the cell's parent row, column, and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> som inkluderer stilinnstillingene for celle arvet fra den cellen overordnet rad kolonne, og <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is not -1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndexer ikke -1.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the preferred size, in pixels, of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Beregner den foretrukne størrelsen på cellen i piksler.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the cell.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> brukes til å tegne cellen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the cell.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen på cellen.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based row index of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte radindeksen av cellen.

trans-unit.source: The cell's maximum allowable size.
trans-unit.target: Den cellen maksimal tillatt størrelse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the preferred size, in pixels, of the cell.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som representerer den foretrukne størrelsen på cellen i piksler.

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is not -1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndexer ikke -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien i cellen.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den cellen overordnet rad.

trans-unit.source: The value contained in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is not -1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndexer ikke -1.

trans-unit.source: Paints the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Maler gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the cell.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> brukes til å fargemerknader i cellen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerer området i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> som må tegnet på nytt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that contains the bounds of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som inneholder grensene i cellen som males.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Radindeksen i cellen som males.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values that specifies the state of the cell.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> verdier som angir tilstanden til cellen.

trans-unit.source: The data of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Dataene i cellen som males.

trans-unit.source: The formatted data of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Formaterte dataene i cellen som males.

trans-unit.source: An error message that is associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: En feilmelding som er knyttet til cellen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that contains formatting and style information about the cell.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> som inneholder informasjon om cellen formatering og stil.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that contains border styles for the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> som inneholder Kantlinjestilene for celle som males.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref> values that specifies which parts of the cell need to be painted.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av det <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"> </xref> verdier som angir hvilke deler av cellen må males.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Angir verdien i cellen.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den cellen overordnet rad.

trans-unit.source: The cell value to set.
trans-unit.target: Celleverdi til angitt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value has been set; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis verdien er angitt; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is not -1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndexer ikke -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating which sort glyph is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir hvilke sortering symbol vises.

trans-unit.source: This property is set automatically for columns with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er angitt automatisk for kolonner med <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>egenskapen satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must set this property yourself when sorting by columns with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Du må sette denne egenskapen selv ved sortering av kolonner med <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>egenskapen satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"></xref> value representing the current glyph.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"> </xref> verdien som representerer gjeldende tegnet.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du setter denne egenskapen ikke er et gyldig <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"> </xref> verdi.

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, the value of either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OwningColumn*> property or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView*> property of the cell is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir denne egenskapen, verdien for enten den <> </> *> egenskapen eller <> </> *> egenskapen i cellen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: -or- When changing the value of this property, the specified value is not <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"></xref> and the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode*> property of the owning column is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: - eller - når du endrer verdien for denne egenskapen, den angitte verdien er ikke <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"> </xref> verdien av det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode*>-egenskapen for kolonnen eier er <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer strengrepresentasjon av cellen.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current cell.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer gjeldende celle.
